title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Game-Based University Library Utilization Mastery Course

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform key university library services (e.g., academic resource search, study space reservation) with 80%+ accuracy using mobile game-based learning tools
Learners can apply academic information literacy strategies to real-world scenarios through in-game quiz resolution
Learners can propose solutions to job-related problems linked to libraries through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
